last_episode_to_air.name: You Might Also Like
last_episode_to_air.overview: Stay-at-home housewife Mrs. Warren looks forward to acquiring the widely marketed 'Egg,' an enigmatic device that promises to make everything better for everyone forever. But further investigation soon reveals the unsavory truth about this mysterious product.

name: The Twilight Zone
overview: Tales of science fiction, fantasy and the occult, exploring humanity's hopes, despairs, prides and prejudices in metaphoric ways. Next stop ahead The Twilight Zone.
tagline: What dimension are you even in?

episodes.name: The Comedian
episodes.overview: Taking advice from a famous comedian, a stand-up comic makes fun of his own life - with unexpected results.

episodes.name: Nightmare at 30,000 Feet
episodes.overview: A journalist listens to a podcast detailing how the plane on which he's a passenger will disappear.

episodes.name: Replay
episodes.overview: A self-made lawyer and mother named Nina Harrison takes her son Dorian to his first year at college. Her old camcorder can rewind time, but can it help her ensure her son's future?

episodes.name: A Traveler
episodes.overview: On Christmas Eve in Iglaak, Alaska, a mysterious traveler wishes to be pardoned by Captain Lane Pendleton.

episodes.name: The Wunderkind
episodes.overview: A down-on-his-luck campaign manager is determined to get a kid elected as the President of the United States.

episodes.name: Six Degrees of Freedom
episodes.overview: A space crew preparing for the first human flight to Mars is faced with a life-altering decision… and its consequences.

episodes.name: Not All Men
episodes.overview: A meteor shower spreads infection across an entire town, affecting some of the inhabitants more than others.

episodes.name: Point of Origin
episodes.overview: A suburban housewife wants to go home. But where - and what - is home, really?

episodes.name: The Blue Scorpion
episodes.overview: Following the death of his dad, an anthropology professor finds the re-emergence of a gun called the Blue Scorpion which is about to become his most personal research project.

episodes.name: Blurryman
episodes.overview: A writer is haunted by a mysterious figure.

episodes.name: Meet in the Middle
episodes.overview: Lonely bachelor Phil finds meaningful human connection when he discovers a telepathic link to a stranger named Annie. Their connection quickly sparks a romance, but not everything is as it seems in this seemingly idyllic fantasy.

episodes.name: Downtime
episodes.overview: After a recent promotion to hotel manager, Michelle feels like she's on top of the world, but any cause for celebration is short lived when the nature of her reality is called into question.

episodes.name: The Who of You
episodes.overview: Struggling actor Harry risks everything to catch his big break, but an impulsive scheme takes a few turns no one saw coming.

episodes.name: Ovation
episodes.overview: The music career of struggling singer Jasmine takes off overnight after she witnesses a tragic incident. Jasmine begins receiving rapturous applause everywhere she goes, but she soon realizes the relentless recognition comes at a steep cost.

episodes.name: Among the Untrodden
episodes.overview: Transfer student Irene's unusual interests make her an easy target at her new all-girls boarding school until she discovers that popular classmate Madison possesses a unique talent.
At the outer reaches of the world, a team of scientists discover a new highly intelligent species, but its existence may endanger more than their research.

episodes.name: A Human Face
episodes.overview: A grieving couple's move is interrupted by an otherworldly encounter, leading them to second guess what's worth leaving behind.

episodes.name: A Small Town
episodes.overview: A quiet church handyman uncovers a magical scale model imbuing him with the power to help his struggling small town. But with the sleazy Mayor Conway taking all the credit, will Jason's good intentions be corrupted?

episodes.name: Try, Try
episodes.overview: When the quick-witted Claudia has a chance run-in with Mark at a museum, he dazzles her with his seemingly miraculous abilities. But after the true source of his charisma is revealed, the encounter takes a dark turn.

episodes.name: You Might Also Like
episodes.overview: Stay-at-home housewife Mrs. Warren looks forward to acquiring the widely marketed 'Egg,' an enigmatic device that promises to make everything better for everyone forever. But further investigation soon reveals the unsavory truth about this mysterious product.
